message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be highly beneficial for you. I'm asking for $9,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase the product. However, I am only able to pay up to $8,500 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I'm motivated to sell, I can't go as low as $8,500. Could you do $9,000?  I'm confident it's a fair price considering the value you'll gain.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your flexibility. However, I am still unable to meet at $9,000. I am willing to pay up to $8,750 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
